original_text: Joseph was a good man. He wanted to do what was right. He did not want her to become ashamed in front of people. So he decided to stop their marriage secretly.
korean_text: 그의 남편 요셉은 의로운 사람이라 그를 드러내지 아니하고 가만히 끊고자 하여

sentences.original_text: He wanted to do what was right.
He did not want her to become ashamed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀가 부끄럽게 되기를 원하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did not want her to be ashamed in front of people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀가 사람들 앞에서 부끄럽게 되기를 원하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So he decided to stop their marriage secretly.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 비밀리에 그들의 결혼을 중단하기로 결정했습니다.
